summary: Adds a new perk to the game as a level 2 Arcane Blacksmith perk.
descriptionHtml:
------------------
DESCRIPTION
------------------
Adds a new perk to the game as a level 2 Arcane Blacksmith perk.
You need to have level 80 smithing and the level 1 Arcane Blacksmith perk.
The perk allows you to craft Arcane armor and weapons and upgrade them double.
Bring enough filled Grand Soul Gems cause you\'ll be needing them. (so it\'s not OP)

----------
ARMOR
----------
Arcane Boots
Arcane Cuirass
Arcane Gloves
Arcane Hood

-------------
WEAPONS
-------------
Arcane Bow
Arcane Dagger
Arcane Greatsword
Arcane Sword

-------------------
INSTALLATION
-------------------
Extract the .rar file into you \"Skyrim\\Data\" folder and check the box
in your data folder section of the launcher screen. Now you\'re good to go.
author: Amarutu
